hero.title: Keeping businesses flowing smoothly
hero.subtitle: Licensed commercial plumbers for offices, restaurants, retail, and industrial facilities. Maintenance contracts, emergency service, new construction, and tenant improvements. Minimize downtime. Maximize reliability.

about.title: Commercial Plumbing Experts
about.subtitle: Trusted by businesses since 2006
about.content: CommercialFlow specializes in commercial and industrial plumbing. Our licensed plumbers handle everything from routine maintenance to complete plumbing systems for new construction. Available 24/7 for emergencies. Minimize business disruption.

products.name: Commercial Maintenance Contract
products.description: Monthly maintenance program for commercial properties. Preventive service, priority scheduling, discounted repairs.

products.name: Restaurant Plumbing Service
products.description: Specialized restaurant plumbing including grease traps, commercial equipment, and health code compliance.

products.name: Tenant Improvement
products.description: Complete plumbing for office build-outs and tenant improvements. Timely completion, code-compliant.

products.name: Commercial Water Heater
products.description: Commercial water heater installation or replacement. Tankless or tank systems sized for your needs.

products.name: Backflow Prevention
products.description: Backflow preventer installation and annual testing. Required for commercial properties. Certified testers.

products.name: Emergency Service
products.description: 24/7 emergency plumbing for businesses. Fast response to minimize downtime and protect property.

items.text: CommercialFlow handles all plumbing for our three restaurant locations. They understand the urgency when equipment goes down. Reliable, knowledgeable, and fair pricing.
items.author: Maria Rodriguez
items.title: Restaurant Owner

items.text: We use them for all tenant improvements in our office building. Professional work, good communication with tenants, and always pass inspection. Highly recommend.
items.author: David Chen
items.title: Property Manager

items.text: When our main water line broke, they had a crew there within an hour and fixed it with minimal disruption. Now on our maintenance contract. Great service!
items.author: Jennifer Wilson
items.title: Facility Manager

members.name: Carlos Mendez
members.title: Owner & Master Plumber
members.bio: Licensed Master Plumber with 18+ years in commercial plumbing. Specializes in restaurants, offices, and industrial facilities. Committed to minimizing business disruption.

steps.title: Scheduled Work

steps.title: Inspection & Warranty
steps.description: Pass all inspections and provide warranty
